uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs124.clg11.listener

Class MousePositionListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs124.clg11.listener.MousePositionListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MouseMotionListener, EventListener

    public class MousePositionListener
extends Object
implements MouseMotionListener
    Listener for mouse dragged events in CanvasPanel to retrieve mouse position data
    Author:
    Connor Goddard (clg11), Sam Jackson (slj11), Craig Heptinstall (crh13)
